data.comment: The first-half is under way at Bosuilstadion - Antwerp kick-off to start the match.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Dylan Batubinsika.
In the minute 8, Antwerp move into a 2-0 lead through a Dieumerci Mbokani header.
Oud-Heverlee have been awarded a penalty in Antwerp...
At Bosuilstadion, Faris Haroun has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Oud-Heverlee have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 12, Goal! Oud-Heverlee now trail just 2-1 thanks to a penalty from Thomas Henry.
Kristiyan Malinov (Oud-Heverlee) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 17, Goal! Kamal Sowah levels the match at 2-2.
Mathieu Maertens (Oud-Heverlee) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Oud-Heverlee's David Hubert has been booked in Antwerp.
In the minute 38, Pierre-Yves Ngawa is booked for the away team.
Ritchie De Laet for Antwerp has been booked by Wim Smet and receives a first yellow card.
The first-half is over at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 46, Oud-Heverlee kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Antwerp move into a 3-2 lead through a Martin Hongla header.
Marc Brys is making the team's first substitution at Bosuilstadion with Moussa Al-Taamari replacing Barnabas Bese.
In the minute 60, The home team replace Faris Haroun with Manuel Benson.
The away team have replaced Mathieu Maertens with Olivier Myny. This is the second substitution made today by Marc Brys.
Antwerp make their second substitution with Jordan Lukaku replacing Simen Juklerod.
In the minute 82, Aurelio Buta is on a sub for Koji Miyoshi for Antwerp.
Daan Vekemans is replacing Kristiyan Malinov for the away team.
Thomas Henry (Oud-Heverlee) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 88, Abdoulaye Seck (Antwerp) has received a yellow card from Wim Smet.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
